description:
Packable and weatherproof, this emergency shelter can be stowed in the car or taken along when adventuring into less-than-ideal conditions. Use it as a group shelter when taking a break mid-hike in rainy conditions. To keep it light and packable, it doesn't include poles – occupants simply hunker inside to support the roof.

  • Made of lightweight windproof and waterproof polyester with vents for airflow
  • Clear window panels let you see what's going on outside and are fully waterproof
  • Recessed roof pockets allow you to add trekking poles as optional roof supports
  • Waterproof seated areas function as anchors
  • Reflective accents
  • Includes a stuff sack
  • Maximum height inside is 94cm
name: Rab Group 8-10-Person Shelter
